name: Just Movies Quiz | Name the Movie | 10 Questions

questions.text: The US President's plane is taken over by terrorists who demand the release of an imprisoned General.
questions.explanation:
Air Force One.

	Harrison Ford stars as the President.

questions.text: A man literally swaps faces with his enemy in order to find a bomb.
questions.explanation:
Face/Off.

	John Travolta and Nicolas Cage star. This is my favourite movie!

questions.text: Oil drillers are sent to space to blow up an asteroid heading for earth.
options: The Day The Earth Stood Still

questions.text: A dorky man finds a mask in a river and when he puts it on, he is transformed into a manic green-faced man.
questions.explanation:
The Mask.

	Jim Carrey delivers his usual crazy and hilarious performance.

questions.text: A man with a limp tells an agent how he and four other criminals planned a heist which went bad, causing the death of the other four criminals by a mystery man.
questions.explanation:
The Usual Suspects.

	A great ending!

questions.text: A man wakes up in a hotel and realizes that daylight doesn't exist, and only he knows it.
questions.explanation:
Dark City.

	An inventive sci-fi movie.

questions.text: A cop who can't leave a tip promises a waitress half of his winnings if he wins the lottery. After winning four million dollars in the lottery, he sticks to his promise.
options: Cop Gives Waitress 2 Million Dollar Tip
questions.explanation:
It Could Happen To You.

	'Cop Gives Waitress 2 Million Dollar Tip' was the working title for the film.

questions.text: A man realizes that he is living the same day over and over again and uses it to his advantage.
questions.explanation:
Groundhog Day.

	This movie stars Bill Murray.

questions.text: A woman becomes the babysitter for a woman who accused her husband of improper advances, causing her husband to commit suicide and her to have a miscarriage. Once she settles in she plots her revenge.
questions.correct: The Hand That Rocks The Cradle
options: Don't Tell Mom The Babysitter's Dead
questions.explanation:
The Hand That Rocks The Cradle.

	This movie stars Rebecca De Mornay.

questions.text: A man appointed caretaker of a hotel for the winter slowly goes insane due to the evil that lives in the hotel.
questions.explanation:
The Shining.

	This stars Jack Nicholson in an over-the-top performance.
